about_the_game:
In this existence, there are multiple universes and varying dimensions. Each day, they pass unaware of the presence of the others. This changed when, without warning, an
evil God appeared and used his tremendous power to wreck all the universes. This created rifts in time and space. A rift in the dimensions, colliding all the worlds and allowing travel
between them. Sentinels from every race of all the planets encountered each other and war broke out. All parties were confused by the situation, surprised to see sentient beings that
looked different than themselves, lost in the chaos, and puzzled by the mass miscommunication of all the varying languages. The peoples’ new way of living became divided into factions of
religion, principles, and government. Each faction governed by their own set of laws. As factions formed, Samuel founded an organization to unite the races, worlds, and dimensions,
open to all regardless of the time and space they were from. This organization was the Empire.

Post-dimensional rifts, three major galactic powers took the forefront in the universes, the Empire, Mafia, and Militia. Countless units, technologies, machines, and people were
lost in the great war. The war seemed un-ending. To settle it, the three great nations join forces to create the Galactic Cooperation of Races Protection (GCORP). Each nation had a shared
boarder in the universe. They occupied and secured various planets, dividing races, technology, and magic between the three. The Empire would use the varying populous. The Mafia
controlled the technology. The Militia took planet resources. The magic , power sources, and spiritual energies were divided equally among the three. They did not take all but would
monitor and request items and people from the weaker occupied nations. In exchange, there would be no bloodshed and protection would be provided by the GCORP. Amongst each of the three
powerful nations, extraordinary individuals would emerge as the strongest, mightiest, and brightest of the GCORP. They couldn’t stand the evil God’s terror. Those special few would stop
the self-proclaimed God.

This game is a soul born inspired action adventure RPG game. I want to make each character unique and flesh out their own story, background, personality then all of this will affect the character powers, type, talents, skills, fighting styles, and weapons. What's good about my game is the choices you make in the narrative greatly affect the outcome of the story of the game as well as the people in the game world around you. Multiple branching narratives that the player can discover.
